phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Yuno, we are family, right?
Yeah.
But we do not share the same blood.
Yeah.
But we are more connected than people who share the same blood.
What brought this on?
I am saying...
We do not have any blood relatives,
but all of the friends we have made...
And all the friends we are going to make...
Let us treat them just like they are family.
Yeah.
We are almost there.
Once we get through this tunnel...
How amazing!
That is all there is to dungeons?
I wonder how you get in.
It appears the Black Bulls are not here yet.
Of course not.
There is no way they would beat us.
Indeed.
Mimosa!
She is an expert at sensing mana, but she did not notice?
That was not a trap spell...
What is this magic?
Who are you?!
Who stands in my way?
Move.
Friends you can trust are worth their weight in gold.
Sorry, but stay there a while and get weaker.
Win...
Win...
Keep winning, Luck!
Wait.
It is been a while
since things actually got interesting.
More...
More!
Let us fight some more!
I would rather not pluck a bud that is still so young...
I would always close my eyes
And cower at reality
I cannot stand the idea
Of just making excuses to give up
Stand right there
I do not want to be near you
Any minute now
Just wait right there
(The decisive battle is still a long way off)
Black and blue
I will give up on giving up
And get the world on my side
I am looking for the reason I am alive
Every time somewhere under this sky
Break through the tearful nights
And head where the light shines
I want to keep my promise
I will deliver it to you
shape of love
Friends
Luck!
Why cannot you do something so simple?
How many times must I tell you?
Why are you smiling like that?
Why cannot you cry or get angry?
Why were you born that way?!
H-Hey...
You are kidding, right?
One of the common students defeated a noble...
That is never happened before in our school's magic exchange competition.
It is not normal for a commoner to beat a noble.
Crap, I was picking on him.
He might try to get me back.
He is always smiling...
He is super creepy.
Do not get involved with him.
He will beat you to a pulp.
You won against a noble using magic?
That is amazing, Luck!
I had no idea you had such powers!
Normally, no one can beat a noble.
You must be special!
Keep winning.
Win, win, and keep on winning with your powers.
No one will help you in this world.
You must use your own powers.
If that will make you happy, Mother.
Win...
So dangerous.
You have become faster and sharper.
Win...
I will keep winning!
With my powers!
Sorry, but I cannot afford to lose, either.
Smoke Creation Magic: Binding Cross Prison.
Solid smoke?
I cannot move.
This uses up a lot of magic, so I really did not want to use it.
I am out of gas.
You will not be able to zip around anymore, kid.
Now, then...
I wonder how our kid is doing.
Ouchie!
He is not very good at communicating...
Maybe it is the generation gap?
Dream-Healing Flower Cradle.
I am so sorry...
I am supposed to be the healer, and I went down first.
Do not think about unnecessary things.
Right now, concentrate on healing yourself.
That crest...
Is he one of the invading mages from the Diamond Kingdom?
You scoundrel!
You dare attack someone from behind?
Is that something a warrior should do?
I do not know what you are talking about.
What?
You are all the same.
Just pebbles by the wayside.
Back me up, Yuno!
Right.
You Diamond scum!
I will show you the true power of Clover's Golden Dawn!
All right!
This path is a cinch to go down!
The mana is getting denser.
Is the treasure chamber really this way?
Whoa...
What is wrong?
This magic is probably Luck's.
I think he is fighting.
Seriously?
I wonder if that means the enemy really did invade.
The enemy?
We have to go help him out!
But...
Maybe it is better to just leave the fighting to Luck.
If the enemy really got in, I am sure they are after the treasure chamber.
It might be better to head over there first.
We need to take care of this mission fast so Diamond's people will not steal anything.
At this rate, the Golden Dawn will get ahead of us, too.
Win...
I have to keep winning with my powers...
Looks like there is something tying you down.
What I want... is going away...
Huh?
What was the thing I wanted?
He is using such powerful attacks without a grimoire.
Not only that, it does not appear that he is losing any magic.
If this goes on...
Yuno!
You head to the treasure chamber while I am fighting him!
He is strong.
If you fight him without support, even you will not...
Just hurry up and go!
Frankly, I would rather not leave this to a peasant like you!
But it is for our kingdom!
Fulfill our duty!
That is right, you fool.
Curses!
I will set you free...
Yuno, we are family, right?
But we are more connected than people who share the same blood.
Looks like we have got another lively one.
What brought this on?
Why did you come back?!
I am saying...
And who might you be?
I am...
We do not have any blood relatives,
but all of the friends we have made...
You should be concentrating on the mission!
And all the friends we are going to make...
Let us treat them just like they are family.
No...
We are friends!
Yuno!
You head to the treasure chamber while I am fighting him!
That is right, you fool.
Curses!
I will set you free...
Why did you come back, you fool?!
You need to hurry up and get to the treasure chamber,
for the sake of the Clover Kingdom!
Let us defeat him and go together.
All three of us!
Now you are going to have to face us, old man!
Oh, dear...
Having your friends show up is definitely not in my favor.
Apparently, she just suddenly dropped dead.
She always seemed to be under a lot of stress.
And now her kid's all alone...
How awful.
Well, I am not so sure.
Her kid's sort of weird.
Despite the fact that his mother just died...
He is...
Luck?
He is my prey.
Win...
I am going to win and keep offering those victories to my mom.
I will take care of him myself.
I do not need any friends.
Just my powers...
Hey, what are you
Otherwise, Mom will not accept me.
Have it your way.
Hey!
Guess I should not be holding back anymore.
make Mom accept me...
or I will be all alone!
Do whatever you want!
And I will do what I want!
I will do this alone...
I will not leave you alone!
Not yet!
Some part of me...
I do not care what you think about me!
Do whatever you want!
I have already acknowledged you as my... as our friend!
I am sorry, Mom. I...
was not alone.
True, it seems like it would be more fun if we all fought together.
Yeah!
Well, this is not good at all.
You are going to make an old man get serious.
Smoke Creation Magic: Prison of the Fallen King.
You will not be able to get away anymore, kids.
No matter who we are facing,
we, the Black Bulls, will win!
I am going to get serious now.
What are you...
Wind Creation Magic: Swift White Hawk and Wind Blade Shower.
Simultaneous spell activation?!
And this power... H-He is...
It will be the Golden Dawn that reaches the treasure chamber first!
Take that!
I cut and cut, but there is no end!
It keeps coming back!
I am getting dizzy...
The smoke just keeps getting thicker.
At this rate, we are going to suffocate.
This is not good.
We have to hurry up and defeat that mage.
I can pretty much tell where he is with my magic,
but he will probably dodge, even if I attack.
Thinking back on our battle so far,
he is able to travel at high speed within the smoke.
And his ability to sense magic is high.
If we are to land a hit on him, we will have to surprise him.
But how do we do that without him noticing our magic?
The downside of this magic is that it drains my powers a lot.
My magic level is still fine, though.
Well, that and the fact that I cannot see the enemy.
But that is no problem.
Because I can sense your magic just fine.
Whoa, there!
Wow, a barrage.
Are you getting desperate?
That is not going to hit me or get rid of the smoke.
You are just wasting magic.
I think the difference in our experience levels is starting to show.
After all, I have fought far more mages than you have.
Huh?
I chased him over.
And I suppressed my magic so he would not notice, and then...
Go!
He cannot sense Asta, so Asta attacked.
It went well.
I guess teamwork really is important.
H-How can this be?
Begone.
My dry emotions gaze at the me from that day
And push me forward
(I cannot find a place to go)
Even the faintest light can still break through the darkness
And change the flow of time
(I will keep believing in you)
In this ever-vivid place
(Break free yourself)
In order to grasp my endless dream
If there is a path that I should choose
(Do you want to try?
Do you want to try?)
Wherever it may lead us
Until my life comes to an end
I will accept any pain that comes my way
(We can try again, we can try again)
Even if we cannot see tomorrow
Holding onto feelings too intense to voice
I will keep screaming them in my heart
Petit Clover!
Family
Family.
Oh, my...
So you decided that you would treat all of the friends you encountered like family.
That is so wonderful.
Yeah.
Family...
So basically, it is like this...
Big Brother Klaus!
That tickles!
Little Brother, allow me to bestow these upon you.
Yay, glasses!
Thanks, Big Brother!
Not a chance...
He is strong...
But if I am going to become the Wizard King, I cannot be defeated here.
Black Clover, Page 17: Destroyer.
Page 17 Destroyer
Not giving up is my magic.
